title: Algerian boxer Imane Khelif celebrates winning gold at the 2024 Olympics in Paris | National | bigcountrynewsconnection.com
text:
Algerian boxer Imane Khelif celebrates winning gold at the 2024 Olympics in Paris
- MOHD RASFAN
- Updated
Tags
As featured on
Algerian Olympic boxing champion Imane Khelif, at the centre of a gender row at the Paris Games, is targeting a second gold in Los Angeles and says she will not be intimidated by Donald Trump.
